products.title: iPhone 5
products.description: A compact and classic design, the iPhone 5 offers a 4-inch Retina display with sharp visuals. It boasts a lightweight aluminum body and improved performance over previous models.

products.title: iPhone 6
products.description: The iPhone 6 features a larger 4.7-inch display, offering a more immersive viewing experience. With a sleek metal finish, it's both stylish and functional, with upgraded camera capabilities.

products.title: iPhone 7
products.description: Introducing water resistance and a new advanced camera system, the iPhone 7 is designed for durability. The device also offers stereo speakers and a vibrant Retina HD display.

products.title: iPhone 8
products.description: With a stunning glass design, the iPhone 8 supports wireless charging and features the powerful A11 Bionic chip. It delivers fast performance and improved graphics for a smooth user experience.

products.title: iPhone X
products.description: A groundbreaking model, the iPhone X features Face ID technology and a brilliant edge-to-edge OLED display. It offers an immersive experience with true-to-life colors and a sleek, futuristic design.

products.title: iPhone 11
products.description: The iPhone 11 introduces a dual-camera system with Night mode for stunning low-light photos. Its A13 Bionic chip ensures powerful performance, and the battery life has been significantly improved.

products.title: iPhone 12
products.description: Equipped with 5G technology, the iPhone 12 offers faster connectivity and download speeds. It features a Ceramic Shield for better drop protection and a Super Retina XDR display for stunning visuals.

products.title: iPhone 13
products.description: The iPhone 13 comes with a smaller notch, offering more screen space and enhanced visuals. It provides longer battery life and improved camera performance, perfect for capturing life's moments.

products.title: iPhone 14
products.description: The iPhone 14 features an advanced dual-camera system and a new design with flat edges. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, it offers incredible performance and efficiency for all your tasks.

products.title: iPhone 15
products.description: The latest model, the iPhone 15, boasts cutting-edge technology with a sleek, modern design. It features a powerful new chip, enhanced camera capabilities, and a stunning display for an unmatched experience.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S5
products.description: The Galaxy S5 offers a 5.1-inch Super AMOLED display with vibrant colors and sharp details. It features a water-resistant design and an advanced 16 MP camera for stunning photos.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S6
products.description: With a sleek glass and metal design, the Galaxy S6 boasts a 5.1-inch Quad HD display. It includes wireless charging capabilities and a fast, efficient processor for smooth performance.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S7
products.description: The Galaxy S7 features a 5.1-inch Quad HD display and is water and dust resistant. Its dual-pixel camera technology delivers fast focusing and excellent low-light performance.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S8
products.description: The Galaxy S8 offers an immersive 5.8-inch Infinity Display with minimal bezels. It includes an advanced facial recognition system and a powerful Exynos 8895 processor.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S9
products.description: With a refined design, the Galaxy S9 features a 5.8-inch Super AMOLED display and stereo speakers. The camera offers Super Slow-mo video capabilities and low-light enhancements.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S10
products.description: The Galaxy S10 boasts a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display and an ultrasonic fingerprint sensor. It features a versatile triple-camera system and an all-day intelligent battery.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S20
products.description: Featuring a 6.2-inch Quad HD+ display, the Galaxy S20 offers 5G connectivity and 8K video recording. Its advanced camera system includes a 64 MP telephoto lens and Space Zoom.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Galaxy S21 comes with a 6.2-inch Full HD+ display and a powerful Exynos 2100 processor. It has a pro-grade camera system with 30x Space Zoom and enhanced night mode.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S22
products.description: With a sleek design, the Galaxy S22 features a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED display and a versatile triple-camera setup. It offers enhanced low-light photography and a fast-charging battery.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.description: The latest Galaxy S23 features a cutting-edge 6.2-inch AMOLED display and a powerful Exynos 2200 chip. It offers an advanced camera system with AI-enhanced photography and video capabilities.

products.title: OPPO F1
products.description: The OPPO F1, known as the 'Selfie Expert,' features a 5-inch display and a 13 MP rear camera. It offers a sleek design and impressive front camera capabilities for great selfies.

products.title: OPPO F3
products.description: With dual selfie cameras, the OPPO F3 offers a 5.5-inch display and a 16 MP main camera. It delivers great performance and an extended battery life for a smooth user experience.

products.title: OPPO F5
products.description: The OPPO F5 features a 6-inch FHD+ display and an AI-powered 20 MP front camera. It's designed for stunning selfies and clear, vibrant visuals, ideal for social media enthusiasts.

products.title: OPPO F7
products.description: Featuring a 6.23-inch display with a notch, the OPPO F7 boasts a 25 MP AI-powered front camera. It offers advanced beauty modes and a powerful MediaTek Helio P60 processor.

products.title: OPPO F9
products.description: The OPPO F9 offers a waterdrop screen design and a 25 MP front camera with AI Beauty Technology. It supports VOOC Flash Charge for faster charging and has a vibrant 6.3-inch display.

products.title: OPPO Reno 2
products.description: The OPPO Reno 2 features a quad-camera setup and a 6.5-inch AMOLED display. It has a unique shark-fin pop-up front camera and offers 20x digital zoom for versatile photography.

products.title: OPPO Reno 3
products.description: With a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, the OPPO Reno 3 offers a 48 MP quad-camera system. It supports 5G connectivity and provides a sleek, stylish design for modern users.

products.title: OPPO Find X3 Pro
products.description: The OPPO Find X3 Pro boasts a 6.7-inch AMOLED display and a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor. It features a 50 MP quad-camera system and offers 10-bit color for vivid, lifelike visuals.

products.title: Vivo V5
products.description: The Vivo V5 is known for its impressive 20 MP front camera, offering crystal-clear selfies. It features a 5.5-inch display and comes with a sleek, lightweight design.

products.title: Vivo V7
products.description: With a 24 MP front camera, the Vivo V7 is perfect for selfie enthusiasts. It features a 5.7-inch FullView display and offers a comfortable, one-handed operation.

products.title: Vivo V9
products.description: The Vivo V9 offers a 6.3-inch Full HD+ display with a notch design. It includes a dual rear camera setup and a 24 MP front camera for stunning selfies and group shots.

products.title: Vivo V11
products.description: Featuring an in-display fingerprint sensor, the Vivo V11 offers a 6.41-inch Super AMOLED display. Its 25 MP front camera and AI features enhance photo quality and user experience.

products.title: Vivo V15
products.description: The Vivo V15 comes with a 32 MP pop-up front camera and a 6.53-inch Ultra FullView display. It includes a triple rear camera setup with AI features for superior photography.

products.title: Vivo V17
products.description: With a 48 MP quad-camera system, the Vivo V17 offers impressive photography capabilities. It features a 6.44-inch Super AMOLED display and a 32 MP front camera for great selfies.

products.title: Vivo V19
products.description: The Vivo V19 features a 6.44-inch AMOLED display and dual front cameras, including a 32 MP main camera. Its AI-powered quad rear camera setup delivers stunning photos in any lighting.

products.title: Vivo V20
products.description: The Vivo V20 offers a sleek design with a 6.44-inch AMOLED display and a 44 MP Eye Autofocus front camera. It features a 64 MP triple rear camera setup for versatile photography.

products.title: Vivo V21
products.description: Featuring a 6.44-inch AMOLED display and a 44 MP front camera with OIS, the Vivo V21 is designed for crystal-clear selfies. It includes a 64 MP rear camera with night mode for excellent low-light photography.

products.title: Vivo X60 Pro
products.description: The Vivo X60 Pro boasts a 6.56-inch AMOLED display and a powerful Snapdragon 870 processor. It features a ZEISS co-engineered imaging system for professional-grade photos and videos.

products.title: Infinix Hot 8
products.description: The Infinix Hot 8 offers a 6.52-inch HD+ display and a triple rear camera setup. It features a large 5000 mAh battery for extended use and a sleek, modern design.

products.title: Infinix S5
products.description: With a 6.6-inch Infinity-O display, the Infinix S5 provides an immersive viewing experience. It has a 32 MP AI front camera and a quad rear camera system for versatile photography.

products.title: Infinix Note 7
products.description: The Infinix Note 7 features a 6.95-inch HD+ display and a 48 MP quad-camera setup. It includes a powerful Helio G70 processor and a large battery for gaming and multitasking.

products.title: Infinix Hot 9
products.description: The Infinix Hot 9 boasts a 6.6-inch HD+ display and a 13 MP AI quad-camera. It offers a 5000 mAh battery and DTS audio processing for an enhanced audio experience.

products.title: Infinix Zero 8
products.description: Featuring a 6.85-inch Full HD+ display, the Infinix Zero 8 offers a dual front camera setup and a 64 MP quad rear camera. It provides fast charging and a smooth gaming experience.

products.title: Infinix Hot 10
products.description: The Infinix Hot 10 offers a 6.78-inch HD+ display and a 16 MP AI quad-camera. It comes with a MediaTek Helio G70 processor and a large 5200 mAh battery for extended use.

products.title: Infinix Note 10 Pro
products.description: The Infinix Note 10 Pro offers a 6.95-inch Full HD+ display and a 64 MP quad-camera system. It comes with a Helio G95 processor and 33W fast charging for a premium experience.

products.title: Huawei P20
products.description: The Huawei P20 features a 5.8-inch Full HD display and a dual rear camera setup with Leica optics. It offers a sleek design and powerful performance for a premium user experience.

products.title: Huawei P30
products.description: With a 6.1-inch OLED display and a triple rear camera system, the Huawei P30 provides exceptional photography capabilities and vibrant visuals. It includes a powerful Kirin 980 processor.

products.title: Huawei P40
products.description: The Huawei P40 offers a 6.1-inch OLED display and a Leica Quad camera system. It features 5G connectivity and a Kirin 990 chipset for advanced performance and connectivity.

products.title: Huawei Mate 20
products.description: Featuring a 6.53-inch display and a triple rear camera system, the Huawei Mate 20 provides impressive photography and a large screen for immersive experiences. It includes a powerful Kirin 980 processor.

products.title: Huawei Mate 30
products.description: The Huawei Mate 30 features a 6.62-inch OLED display and a Leica Quad camera setup. It supports 5G connectivity and is powered by the Kirin 990 chipset, offering high performance and connectivity.

products.title: Huawei Nova 5
products.description: With a 6.39-inch AMOLED display and a quad-camera system, the Huawei Nova 5 offers a stylish design and powerful performance. It includes a Kirin 980 processor and a large battery for extended use.

products.title: Huawei Nova 6
products.description: The Huawei Nova 6 features a 6.57-inch display and a dual front camera setup. It offers 5G connectivity and a powerful Kirin 990 processor for high-speed performance and connectivity.

products.title: Nokia 6.1
products.description: The Nokia 6.1 features a 5.5-inch Full HD display and a 16 MP rear camera. It offers a clean Android experience and a durable build, suitable for everyday use.

products.title: Nokia 7.1
products.description: With a 5.84-inch Full HD+ display and a dual-camera setup, the Nokia 7.1 offers excellent performance and a high-quality screen. It includes a Snapdragon 636 processor for smooth operation.

products.title: Nokia 8.1
products.description: The Nokia 8.1 features a 6.18-inch Full HD+ display and a dual rear camera system with ZEISS optics. It is powered by the Snapdragon 710 chipset and provides a smooth user experience.

products.title: Nokia 9 PureView
products.description: Featuring a 5.99-inch QHD+ display and a unique five-camera setup, the Nokia 9 PureView offers advanced photography capabilities. It includes a Snapdragon 845 processor for powerful performance.

products.title: Nokia X20
products.description: The Nokia X20 boasts a 6.67-inch Full HD+ display and a quad-camera setup. It supports 5G connectivity and features a durable design, making it a solid choice for modern users.

products.title: Honor 10 Lite
products.description: The Honor 10 Lite features a 6.21-inch Full HD display and a 24 MP front camera. It offers a sleek design and good performance for everyday tasks.

products.title: Honor 20
products.description: With a 6.26-inch Full HD display and a quad-camera system, the Honor 20 provides excellent photo quality and performance. It includes a powerful Kirin 980 processor.

products.title: Honor 30
products.description: The Honor 30 features a 6.53-inch OLED display and a triple-camera setup. It supports 5G connectivity and offers top-notch performance with its Kirin 985 chipset.

products.title: Honor X10
products.description: The Honor X10 comes with a 6.63-inch Full HD+ display and a 40 MP triple-camera system. It includes a pop-up selfie camera and 5G support for future-proof connectivity.

products.title: Honor V40
products.description: Featuring a 6.72-inch OLED display and a 50 MP quad-camera setup, the Honor V40 offers advanced photography and high performance with its MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ processor.

products.title: Xiaomi Mi A3
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi A3 features a 6.08-inch AMOLED display and a triple-camera system. It offers a clean Android experience and a powerful Snapdragon 665 processor.

products.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 9
products.description: With a 6.53-inch Full HD+ display and a quad-camera setup, the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 offers excellent performance and battery life with its 5020 mAh battery.

products.title: Xiaomi Mi 10
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi 10 features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display and a 108 MP quad-camera system. It includes a Snapdragon 865 processor and 5G support for high-speed connectivity.

products.title: Xiaomi Poco X3
products.description: The Poco X3 offers a 6.67-inch Full HD+ display with a 120 Hz refresh rate and a 64 MP quad-camera setup. It provides strong performance with its Snapdragon 732G chipset.

products.title: Xiaomi Redmi K40
products.description: Featuring a 6.67-inch AMOLED display and a 48 MP triple-camera system, the Xiaomi Redmi K40 offers high performance with its Snapdragon 888 processor and 5G support.

products.title: Motorola Moto G8
products.description: The Motorola Moto G8 features a 6.4-inch Full HD display and a triple-camera setup. It offers a clean Android experience and a large 4000 mAh battery.

products.title: Motorola Moto G Power
products.description: With a 6.4-inch Full HD+ display and a 16 MP triple-camera system, the Moto G Power includes a massive 5000 mAh battery for extended use and a Snapdragon 665 processor.

products.title: Motorola Moto Edge
products.description: The Motorola Moto Edge offers a 6.7-inch OLED display with a 90 Hz refresh rate and a 64 MP triple-camera setup. It includes a Snapdragon 765G processor and 5G support.

products.title: Motorola Moto Razr
products.description: The Motorola Moto Razr features a 6.2-inch foldable OLED display and a 48 MP rear camera. It combines classic design with modern technology, including a Snapdragon 710 processor.

products.title: Motorola Moto G Stylus
products.description: Featuring a 6.4-inch Full HD+ display and a 48 MP quad-camera system, the Moto G Stylus includes a built-in stylus for note-taking and creative tasks, powered by a Snapdragon 665 chipset.
